heading: 2.1 Geometry, Grid, Zone
text:
itasca module defines functions classes interaction Python FLAC3D..command function used issue series FLAC3D commands..zone.count function creates 1000 zonesThe .zone.find(1) returns Zone object id 1. object assigned Python variable \(z\).variable \(z\) Zone object (FLAC3D zone)pos method object returns zone centroid.statement used iterate sequences things,
Loop FLAC3D zones.Check sum zone volumes expect.Let’s find zone near center model
code:
"""
import itasca as it
it.command("python-reset-state false")
""""""
it.zone.count() # outputs 1000
""""""
z = it.zone.find(1)
print z # outputs <itasca.zone.Zone object at 0x00000001B388600, ID : 1>
z.pos() # outputs vec3(( 5.00000e-01, 5.00000e-01, 5.00000e-01))
""""""
volume_sum = 0.0
for z in it.zone.list():
  volume_sum += z.vol()
""""""
print volume_sum # outputs 1000.0
print z.vol() * it.zone.count()
assert volume_sum == z.vol() * it.zone.count() # outputs 1000.0
""""""
z = it.zone.near ((5,5,5))
#confirm position with pos method
z.pos() # outputs vec3(( 4.500000e+00, 4.500000e+00, 4.500000e+00))
"""
